item.title: Environ assessment for const & operation of proposed TRIGA research reactor.No significant environ impact attributable to facility.EIS not needed.No significant impact finding appropriate.
item.author: NRC

item.title: Forwards Insp Repts 50-192/86-01 & 50-602/86-01 on 860410-11.No violation noted.Nuclear engineering teaching lab staff should be closely evaluated in order to meet increased demands.

item.title: Forwards Insp Repts 50-192/88-02 & 50-602/88-02 on 880309-11.No violations or deviations noted.Lack of adequate personnel resources & health physics being provided for Mark I reactor defueling & decommissioning noted.
